TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ManagementPath extends System.Object implements class System.ICloneable

summary.span: WMI (Windows Management Instrumentation) オブジェクトへのパスを解析および構築するためのラッパーを提供します。

span.span: Provides a wrapper for parsing and building paths to WMI objects.

remarks.format: ## Examples 例を次に示しますが、どのクラスが WMI オブジェクトへのパスを解析します。The following example demonstrates how the class parses a path to a WMI object. 例では解析されるパスは、クラスのインスタンスへのパスです。The path that is parsed in the example is a path to an instance of a class. span.span: The default scope is \\\\.\root\cimv2, and can be changed by setting this property.

span.span: Returns a that contains the default scope (namespace) path used when no scope is specified.
